language.entry: “Remind yourself that underconfidence is a putrid killer.”
Underconfident
Descendant of the Conqueror
Glory awaits.
I'll wait the time needed.
If they stand behing you, protect them. If they stand against you, defeat them
This might be my moment of triumph. This battle could be my greatest victory.
Glory can't be gifted by earned.
UThose who arise to oversee this world are undying. Daughter of the Conqueror.
What is it that impels me? What force spurs my on?
What sustained my wanderings and led me here?
What is it that makes me fight?
Tis volition. Unbending will.
I'm here because I willed it.
Let me show that living holds worth enough to fight for!
My land.
My empire.
My Conquest.
Stenght is life... for the strong have the right to rule.
Honor is life... for with no honor one may as well be dead.
Loyalty is life... for without one's clan one has no purpose.
Death is life... one should die as they have lived.
Death is life... one should die as they have lived.
It's better to be a lion for a day than a sheep all your life.
If you're goint to hace a story, have a big one or none at all.
I won't stop when I'm tired. I stop when I'm done.
The Kiss of the eternal rest... shall wait another day.
Afore my death... is this all I have?
My will, as my all, is yours to take as long I can fight once more time.
The eternal march.
